about.card.bio1: I am {age} years old, and I have always been interested in creation and digital. It is this curiosity that has led me to learn by myself fields that interest me.
about.card.bio2: I learned how to program in different computer languages, such as: HTML, Python and JavaScript, which allowed me to contribute to open source projects, including a web application for students, as well as to create my own website.
about.card.bio3: All my programming projects are visible to everyone on my GitHub profile: all my projects are called "Open Source".
about.card.title: Hi! I'm Evann DREUMONT !
